title: Unraveling Charlotte
description: How far would you go to protect those you love?Would you brave raging oceans and treacherous mountain paths, hunt down the fiercest predators, and fight the strongest enemies? Would you take a stand, knowing that your own life is at risk?Would you kill?One chilling evening, I found myself caught in the wrong place at the wrong time. As I stared down the barrel of a gun, all I could think about was my little brother, who already lost so much.I should have died, but he spared me—the man wrapped in shadows and secrets. He let me slip from his grasp, allowing me to breathe another day. Why?Questions claw at my thoughts, demanding answers, yet I fear the truth might shatter the fragile reality I’ve built for my brother and me.My thirst for understanding refuses to be ignored, however, and the world around me unravels, mirroring the secrets that veil this town. As I pry into the darkness, I can’t help but feel the tendrils of madness creeping in, threatening to destroy my sanity.In a town where everyone has a secret, and danger lurks around every bend, I am presented with an ultimatum—to remain in the safety of ignorance or take a dive into the unknown with three strangers who swear they will protect us.* This marks the debut installment of the Dynasty of Shadows series, which is a why choose dark romance. Within this series, you will find sexual content, violence, and mature language not intended for a youthful audience. Recommended reading age 18+
author: Sarah    Kennedy
